column4: run the upgrade from 10.04 to 10.10 on my samsung NC10 the night before last but it didn't work :( any tips?
it almost boots up, asks for my keyring password, and warns of low disk space (1GB left) but no menus or anything appear, just the brownish background and and X for a cursor
hmz, just booted up again and this time don't even get the X cursor (although it does still do the keyring and space warning thing)
